title: A SHORT FILM ABOUT LOVING
synopsis: Due to COVID-19, students from a utopian high school were forced to return home. Heartbroken from a recent break up, Tom wanders around and confronts lovers who were also experiencing separation. The film is only available for offline screenings, please contact for more information.
screenings: OKIA Outdoor Cinema (Hanoi, Vietnam), Fulbright University Vietnam (HCMC, Vietnam), Mahindra United World College (Pune, India), Olympia Cinema (Cannes, France)
